file_content.text: Karagga desires that you savor his hospitality.
Who dares barge into my palace unannounced?
You have entered the colossal presence of the almighty Karagga the Unyielding, Grand Mogul of the Hutt Cartel.
Republic scum! First you trespass on my newest territories and now you dare invade my home as well!
Imperial cheats! Not content to steal from my borders, so they send their assassins!
